summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such city on Tuesday, March 4, 1919, the proposition for the creation of an indebtedness in the sum of Seven Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($750,000) by the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing coupon bonds of the City of Seattle in said amount, for the construction of a bridge across the Lake Washington Canal at Montlake Boulevard in said City.
